resources.string: This luxury boat leaves beautiful Amsterdamn and finishes 7 days later in Budapest, Hungary.
Bikes equipped with gel seats are our mode of transportation to view the landscape, history and customs and traditions.
The magestic Parliament building lies in the center of Budapest, Hungary.
Join us for a dream vacation filled with biking in cities throughout Europe from Amsterdamn to Budapest. The next trip leaves on June 2.
Summer - Bike and Barge Europe Tour.
